description:
As a CTO, I have built the IT team (5-10 people), the IT infrastructure, the different development methods and I also have participated to the conception of the different IT products of the company.

I was also in charge of the strategic decisions for the IT department and ensure that the IT could support the rapid growth of the company.

I also have mainly worked as a Back-end Lead Developer (PHP/MySQL, CodeIgniter) and as the main Android Developer using Java.

As a Software Engineer I have developed an Android application dedicated to students having work scheduling problems. I have worked with several AI researchers from the LIP6 (Laboratoire d'Informatique de Paris 6) on this project.

I also have worked on the conception of a professional software aimed to Industrial Products Designers. The software aimed to visualize and edit Conceptual Graphs

I have worked on the refactoring and the optimization of a syntax and semantic parser written in Python for an advanced chatterbot. This chatterbot used many techniques from Artificial Intelligence in several domains: NLP, Knowledge Engineering (ontologies) and Semantic Web (RDF-OWL, Wordnet...)
